name: Elf Overtime!
description:
Christmas is here and people want presents! Help guide the busy elves to give customers the presents they want!

How to Play:

Control the game with the mouse

Drag and drop workers onto producers to produce presents

Drag presents onto customers of the same color to earn points

Earn enough points to go to the next level!

If you run out of time or too many customers are dissatisfied you will lose!

Credits:

Kreekakon
Textures.com
Google Image Search for Gift Pictures
freesound.org
Buhary font by Haris Prawoto

Software Used:

Unreal Engine 4
Goldwave
Flash CS3

Developer's Notes:

This game was created for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam. I had very little time during this jam due to being busy for most of the jam period so I decided to stick to something much smaller as opposed to what my usual jam entries are like. I also originaly wanted to make a browser version but unfortunately did not have enough time to figure out a way to do this properly with Unreal Engine 4.

I hope you enjoy the game!
